datasets.name: abad16cd
queryLines:
-- Location + parameter daily trend + max limit recommended
WITH max_recommended AS (
    SELECT *
    FROM (
        VALUES
            (2, 20),         -- PM2.5 (24h) µg/m³
            (1, 45),         -- PM10 (24h) µg/m³
            (3, 120),        -- Ozone (8h) µg/m³
            (5, 50),         -- NO2 (24h) µg/m³
            (6, 50),         -- SO2 (24h) µg/m³
            (4, 4000)        -- CO (24h) µg/m³
    ) AS t(parameter_id, max_limit)
)
SELECT sdc.country_code, location_id, loc.name as location_name, parameter_id, parameter_name, day_start, avg_value, mr.max_limit AS max_limit
FROM airq.sensor_daily_completeness AS sdc
LEFT JOIN airq.dim_locations loc USING (location_id)
LEFT JOIN max_recommended mr USING (parameter_id)
WHERE day_start >= date_sub(current_date, :lookback_days)
GROUP BY sdc.country_code, location_id, loc.name, parameter_id, parameter_name, day_start, avg_value, max_limit
ORDER BY day_start;

datasets.name: 3365ea60
queryLines:
-- Data completeness
SELECT
  AVG(completeness_ratio) AS completeness_percent, loc.name as location_name
FROM airq.sensor_daily_completeness
LEFT JOIN airq.dim_locations loc USING (location_id)
WHERE day_start >= date_sub(current_date(), :lookback_days)
GROUP BY location_name
ORDER BY completeness_percent DESC;

datasets.name: e963ee19
queryLines:
SELECT parameter_id, parameter_name, avg_value AS max_avg_value, parameter_units, location_id, location_name, country_code
FROM (
    SELECT 
        sdc.parameter_id,
        sdc.parameter_name,
        sdc.avg_value,
        s.parameter_units,
        sdc.location_id,
        loc.name as location_name,
        sdc.country_code,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (
            PARTITION BY sdc.parameter_name 
            ORDER BY sdc.avg_value DESC
        ) AS rn
    FROM workspace.airq.sensor_daily_completeness sdc
    LEFT JOIN workspace.airq.dim_locations loc
        ON sdc.location_id = loc.location_id
    LEFT JOIN workspace.airq.dim_sensors s
        ON sdc.sensor_id = s.sensor_id
    WHERE sdc.day_start >= date_sub(current_date, :lookback_days)
) t
WHERE rn = 1
ORDER BY parameter_name ASC;

datasets.name: 9c5c395b
queryLines:
SELECT
  loc.name as location_name, count(distinct sensor_id) sensors_read
FROM airq.sensor_daily_completeness sdc
LEFT JOIN workspace.airq.dim_locations loc
        ON sdc.location_id = loc.location_id
WHERE day_start >= date_sub(current_date(), :lookback_days)
group by location_name

datasets.name: d95b2f36
queryLines:
SELECT sensor_id, parameter_id, parameter_name, location_id, location_name, country_code, day_start, datediff(current_date(), day_start) as days_since_reading
FROM (
    SELECT 
        sdc.sensor_id,
        sdc.parameter_id,
        sdc.parameter_name,
        sdc.location_id,
        loc.name as location_name,
        sdc.day_start,
        sdc.country_code,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (
            PARTITION BY sdc.sensor_id 
            ORDER BY sdc.day_start DESC
        ) AS rn
    FROM workspace.airq.sensor_daily_completeness sdc
    LEFT JOIN workspace.airq.dim_locations loc
        ON sdc.location_id = loc.location_id
    WHERE sdc.day_start >= date_sub(current_date, :lookback_days)
) t
WHERE rn = 1 and datediff(current_date(), day_start) > 0
ORDER BY days_since_reading DESC;

datasets.name: 189a23ab
queryLines:
WITH max_recommended AS (
    SELECT *
    FROM (
        VALUES
            (2, 20),         -- PM2.5 (24h) µg/m³
            (1, 45),         -- PM10 (24h) µg/m³
            (3, 120),        -- Ozone (8h) µg/m³
            (5, 50),         -- NO2 (24h) µg/m³
            (6, 50),         -- SO2 (24h) µg/m³
            (4, 4000)        -- CO (24h) µg/m³
    ) AS t(parameter_id, max_limit)
)
SELECT sdc.country_code, sdc.location_id, loc.name as location_name, sdc.parameter_id, sdc.parameter_name, s.parameter_units, day_start, avg_value, mr.max_limit AS max_limit, (avg_value - max_limit) / max_limit * 100 as perc_above_limit
FROM airq.sensor_daily_completeness AS sdc
LEFT JOIN airq.dim_locations loc USING (location_id)
LEFT JOIN max_recommended mr USING (parameter_id)
LEFT JOIN workspace.airq.dim_sensors s ON sdc.sensor_id = s.sensor_id
WHERE day_start = current_date() AND max_limit IS NOT NULL AND avg_value > max_limit
GROUP BY sdc.country_code, sdc.location_id, loc.name, sdc.parameter_id, sdc.parameter_name, s.parameter_units, day_start, avg_value, max_limit
ORDER BY day_start;

datasets.name: c1ff8f17
queryLines:
SELECT
  loc.name
FROM airq.sensor_daily_completeness sdc
LEFT JOIN workspace.airq.dim_locations loc
        ON sdc.location_id = loc.location_id
WHERE day_start >= date_sub(current_date(), :lookback_days)
group by loc.name
